interface.name: world.interfaces.Installation
interface.description: Any simulation object that can be damaged by the crowd agent.

method.name: damageIt
method.description: To damage this element. Returns 'true' upon action completion.

argument.name: quantityOfDamage
argument.description: The quantity of damage to apply onto the installation.

method.name: isDamaged
method.description: Returns 'true' if this element is damaged, 'false' otherwise.

method.name: canBeDamaged
method.description: Return 'true' if this element can be damaged by the crowd agent, 'false' otherwise.
